title: RFC 5322 Email Address
description: An Internet email address in addr-spec format as defined in RFC 5322 Section 3.4.1. The addr-spec consists of a local-part followed by an at-sign (@) followed by a domain. The local-part may be a dot-atom, quoted-string, or obsolete local-part. The domain may be a dot-atom, domain-literal (IP address in brackets), or obsolete domain.
